title: fix: update z-image SPAN model path and vastai docs
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Optimized Z-Image upscaling configuration and expanded GPU infrastructure documentation.
gist.impact: Image generation queues have dropped to near zero, delivering significantly faster results for users.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee optimizing a retro server rack to represent the infrastructure upgrades and speed boost. The scene should feel busy but organized, implying efficiency.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee adding a glowing lime green component to a retro server stack. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Digital vines connecting the machines. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
